channel.title: NAS:FNWB on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NAS:FNWB on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Water ‘Ponzi’ That Burned Jefferies Had Something for Everyone, Until It Didn’t
item.description: A vending-machine venture that once touted juicy, super-safe returns is now the target of federal prosecutors and a tangle of lawsuits by angry investors who say they were duped.
